en.title: Electricity Cost Calculator
en.seoTitle: Electricity Cost Calculator - How Much Does My Electricity Cost?
en.metaDescription: Free electricity cost calculator. Calculate your monthly, weekly, and yearly electricity bills based on kWh usage and rates. Plan energy budget.
longTailKeywords: how much does electricity cost per month
en.summary: Calculate your monthly electricity bill based on kWh usage and your utility rate.
en.description: Our electricity cost calculator helps you estimate your monthly electric bill. Enter your monthly kilowatt-hour (kWh) usage and your rate per kWh to calculate daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly costs.
instructions: Enter your monthly kWh usage from your electric bill
Enter your utility rate per kWh (usually shown on your bill)
View costs broken down by day, week, month, and year
Calculate potential savings from reducing usage
en.seoTitle: Electricity Cost Calculator - How Much Does My Electricity Cost?
en.metaDescription: Free electricity cost calculator. Calculate your monthly, weekly, and yearly electricity bills based on kWh usage and rates. Plan energy budget.

seoContent.introduction: Calculate your electricity costs instantly with our free electricity cost calculator. Simply enter your monthly kilowatt-hour (kWh) usage and your utility rate per kWh to see your daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly electricity expenses. Plan your energy budget and identify potential savings.
seoContent.benefits: Calculate exact electricity costs based on your usage • Compare costs across different timeframes (daily, weekly, monthly, annual) • Identify high-energy appliances and their costs • Plan budget for upcoming months • Calculate savings from reduced usage
seoContent.formula: Monthly Cost = Monthly Usage (kWh) × Rate per kWh ($). Daily Cost = Monthly Cost ÷ 30. Weekly Cost = Monthly Cost ÷ 4.33. Yearly Cost = Monthly Cost × 12.

faqs.question: How do I find my kWh usage?
faqs.answer: Check your electricity bill - it shows your monthly kWh consumption in a prominent place, usually at the top or bottom of the bill.

faqs.question: Where is the rate per kWh listed?
faqs.answer: Your utility rate is typically shown on your bill as cents per kWh or $/kWh. It may vary by region and season.

faqs.question: Can I calculate savings from reducing electricity?
faqs.answer: Yes! Enter your desired usage reduction percentage to see potential monthly and yearly savings.

faqs.question: Why do electricity rates vary?
faqs.answer: Rates depend on location, season (peak vs off-peak), usage level, and local utility pricing structures.

faqs.question: What uses the most electricity?
faqs.answer: HVAC systems (heating/cooling), water heaters, and large appliances typically account for 50-80% of residential electricity use.

es.title: Calculadora de Costo de Electricidad
es.seoTitle: Calculadora de Costo de Electricidad - ¿Cuánto Cuesta Mi Electricidad?
es.metaDescription: Calculadora gratuita de costo de electricidad. Calcula tus gastos de electricidad mensuales, semanales y anuales basados en el uso de kWh y tarifas.
es.summary: Calcula tu factura de electricidad mensual basada en el uso de kWh y tu tarifa de servicios.
es.description: Nuestra calculadora de costo de electricidad te ayuda a estimar tu factura de electricidad mensual. Ingresa tu uso mensual de kilovatios-hora (kWh) y tu tarifa por kWh.

seoContent.introduction: Calcula tus costos de electricidad al instante con nuestra calculadora gratuita de costos de electricidad. Simplemente ingresa tu uso mensual de kilovatios-hora (kWh) y tu tarifa de servicios por kWh para ver tus gastos de electricidad diarios, semanales, mensuales y anuales.
seoContent.benefits: Calcula costos exactos de electricidad basados en tu consumo • Compara costos en diferentes períodos de tiempo • Identifica electrodomésticos de alto consumo • Planifica presupuesto para próximos meses • Calcula ahorros potenciales
seoContent.formula: Costo Mensual = Uso Mensual (kWh) × Tarifa por kWh ($). Costo Diario = Costo Mensual ÷ 30. Costo Semanal = Costo Mensual ÷ 4.33.

faqs.question: ¿Cómo encuentro mi consumo en kWh?
faqs.answer: Revisa tu factura de electricidad - muestra tu consumo mensual de kWh en un lugar prominente, generalmente en la parte superior o inferior.

faqs.question: ¿Dónde está la tarifa por kWh?
faqs.answer: Tu tarifa de servicios se muestra típicamente en tu factura como centavos por kWh o $/kWh.

faqs.question: ¿Puedo calcular ahorros reduciendo el uso?
faqs.answer: ¡Sí! Ingresa el porcentaje de reducción de uso deseado para ver ahorros mensuales y anuales potenciales.

pt.title: Calculadora de Custo de Eletricidade
pt.seoTitle: Calculadora de Custo de Eletricidade - Quanto Custa Minha Eletricidade?
pt.metaDescription: Calculadora gratuita de custo de eletricidade. Calcule seus gastos de eletricidade mensais, semanais e anuais com base no uso de kWh e taxas.
pt.summary: Calcule sua conta de eletricidade mensal com base no uso de kWh e sua taxa de serviço.
pt.description: Nossa calculadora de custo de eletricidade ajuda você a estimar sua conta de eletricidade mensal. Digite seu uso mensal de quilowatt-hora (kWh) e sua taxa por kWh.

seoContent.introduction: Calcule seus custos de eletricidade instantaneamente com nossa calculadora gratuita de custos de eletricidade. Simplesmente digite seu consumo mensal de quilowatt-hora (kWh) e sua taxa de serviço por kWh para ver suas despesas de eletricidade diárias, semanais, mensais e anuais.
seoContent.benefits: Calcule custos exatos de eletricidade com base em seu consumo • Compare custos em diferentes períodos • Identifique aparelhos de alto uso • Planeje orçamento para próximos meses • Calcule economias potenciais
seoContent.formula: Custo Mensal = Uso Mensal (kWh) × Taxa por kWh ($). Custo Diário = Custo Mensal ÷ 30. Custo Semanal = Custo Mensal ÷ 4.33.

faqs.question: Como encontro meu uso de kWh?
faqs.answer: Verifique sua conta de eletricidade - ela mostra seu consumo mensal de kWh em local destacado, geralmente no topo ou rodapé.

faqs.question: Onde está a taxa por kWh?
faqs.answer: Sua taxa de serviço é normalmente mostrada em sua conta como centavos por kWh ou $/kWh.

fr.title: Calculatrice des Coûts d'Électricité
fr.seoTitle: Calculatrice des Coûts d'Électricité - Combien Coûte Mon Électricité?
fr.metaDescription: Calculatrice gratuite des coûts d'électricité. Calculez vos frais d'électricité mensuels, hebdomadaires et annuels en fonction de la consommation en kWh et des tarifs.
fr.summary: Calculez votre facture d'électricité mensuelle en fonction de la consommation en kWh et de votre tarif de service.
fr.description: Notre calculatrice des coûts d'électricité vous aide à estimer votre facture d'électricité mensuelle. Entrez votre consommation mensuelle en kilowatts-heures (kWh) et votre tarif par kWh.

seoContent.introduction: Calculez vos coûts d'électricité instantanément avec notre calculatrice gratuite des coûts d'électricité. Entrez simplement votre consommation mensuelle en kilowatts-heures (kWh) et votre tarif d'électricité par kWh pour voir vos dépenses d'électricité quotidiennes, hebdomadaires, mensuelles et annuelles.
seoContent.benefits: Calculez les coûts exacts d'électricité en fonction de votre consommation • Comparez les coûts sur différentes périodes • Identifiez les appareils à consommation élevée • Planifiez votre budget pour les prochains mois • Calculez les économies potentielles
seoContent.formula: Coût Mensuel = Consommation Mensuelle (kWh) × Tarif par kWh ($). Coût Quotidien = Coût Mensuel ÷ 30. Coût Hebdomadaire = Coût Mensuel ÷ 4.33.

faqs.question: Comment trouver ma consommation en kWh?
faqs.answer: Consultez votre facture d'électricité - elle affiche votre consommation mensuelle en kWh à un endroit bien visible, généralement en haut ou en bas de la facture.

faqs.question: Où est le tarif par kWh?
faqs.answer: Votre tarif d'électricité est généralement affiché sur votre facture en centimes par kWh ou $/kWh.
